revision.text:
<!--경기장_정보-->
{{TemplateMapping
| mapToClass = Stadium
| mappings =
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 이름 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 별칭 | ontologyProperty = foaf:nick }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 원어이름 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 전체이름 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 이전이름 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 위치 | ontologyProperty = location }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 기공 | ontologyProperty = buildingStartDate }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 건설기간 | ontologyProperty = buildingEndDate }}
	{{DateIntervalMapping | templateProperty = 건설기간 | startDateOntologyProperty = buildingStartDate | endDateOntologyProperty = buildingEndDate }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 개장 | ontologyProperty = openingDate }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 보수 | ontologyProperty = rebuildingDate }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 확장 | ontologyProperty = rebuildingDate }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 폐장 | ontologyProperty = dateOfAbandonment }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 철거 | ontologyProperty = demolitionDate }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 소유 | ontologyProperty = owner }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 운영 | ontologyProperty = operator }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 건설비용 | ontologyProperty = cost | unit = Currency }} 	{{ PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 건축가 | ontologyProperty = architect }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 수용인원 | ontologyProperty = seatingCapacity }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 사용처 | ontologyProperty = tenant }}
end}}


<!-- Not Yet Mapping
| 좌표            = 
| 표면            = 
| 프로젝트 매니저 = 
| 사용팀・개최대회 =
| 규모            = 
-->
